description: Manage HTTP settings of an application gateway.

commands.name: az network application-gateway http-settings create
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway http-settings create --gateway-name
                                                    --name
                                                    --port
                                                    --resource-group
                                                    [--affinity-cookie-name]
                                                    [--auth-certs]
                                                    [--connection-draining-timeout]
                                                    [--cookie-based-affinity {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                                    [--enable-probe {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                    [--host-name]
                                                    [--host-name-from-backend-pool {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                    [--path]
                                                    [--probe]
                                                    [--protocol {Http, Https, Tcp, Tls}]
                                                    [--root-certs]
                                                    [--timeout]
examples: az network application-gateway http-settings create -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyHttpSettings --port 80 --protocol Http --cookie-based-affinity Disabled --timeout 30

commands.name: az network application-gateway http-settings delete
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway http-settings delete --gateway-name
                                                    --name
                                                    --resource-group
                                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway http-settings delete -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyHttpSettings

commands.name: az network application-gateway http-settings list
examples: az network application-gateway http-settings list -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway

commands.name: az network application-gateway http-settings show
commands.summary: Get the details of HTTP settings.
examples: az network application-gateway http-settings show -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyHttpSettings

commands.name: az network application-gateway http-settings update
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway http-settings update --gateway-name
                                                    --name
                                                    --resource-group
                                                    [--add]
                                                    [--affinity-cookie-name]
                                                    [--auth-certs]
                                                    [--connection-draining-timeout]
                                                    [--cookie-based-affinity {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                                    [--enable-probe {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                    [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                    [--host-name]
                                                    [--host-name-from-backend-pool {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                    [--path]
                                                    [--port]
                                                    [--probe]
                                                    [--protocol {Http, Https, Tcp, Tls}]
                                                    [--remove]
                                                    [--root-certs]
                                                    [--set]
                                                    [--timeout]
examples: az network application-gateway http-settings update -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyAppGateway -n MyHttpSettings --probe MyNewProbe

commands.name: az network application-gateway http-settings wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
